Name: x_us_selected
Description: Decision to include a user story in the sprint

Name: x_task_selected
Description: Decision to include a task in the sprint backlog

Name: z_feature_in_release
Description: Decision to include a feature in a release

Name: y_worker_task_assignment
Description: Assignment of a worker to a task

Name: s_story_points_committed
Description: Total story points team commits for the sprint

Name: s_sprint_capacity
Description: Estimated capacity (story points) available in the sprint

Name: e_effort_buffer
Description: Buffer effort reserved for unplanned work

Name: b_blocker_resolved
Description: Resolution decision for a blocker within the sprint

Name: r_risk_tolerance
Description: Allowed normalized risk level for the sprint plan
